00267             inline size_t SPKFactory::getNbObjects() const
00268             {
00269                         return SPKRegister.size();
00270             }
00271 
00272             inline bool SPKFactory::isAlreadyProcessed(const Registerable* source)
00273             {
00274                         return SPKAdresses.find(source) != SPKAdresses.end();
00275             }
00276 
00277             inline Registerable* SPKFactory::getProcessedObject(const Registerable* source)
00278             {
00279                         return SPKAdresses.find(source)->second;
00280             }
00281 
00282             inline void SPKFactory::markAsProcessed(const Registerable* source,Registerable* object)
00283             {
00284                         SPKAdresses.insert(std::pair<const Registerable*,Registerable*>(source,object));
00285             }
